00035 /*
00036  * Resizable Icons for Blender
00037  */
00038 
00039 typedef void (*DrawInfoFreeFP) (void *drawinfo);
00040 
00041 struct Icon
00042 {
00043     void *drawinfo;
00044     void *obj;
00045     short type;
00046     DrawInfoFreeFP drawinfo_free;
00047 };
00048 
00049 typedef struct Icon Icon;

00056 /* return icon id for library object or create new icon if not found */
00057 int BKE_icon_getid(struct ID* id);
00058 
00059 /* retrieve icon for id */
00060 struct Icon* BKE_icon_get(int icon_id);
00061

00063 /* used for inserting the internal icons */
00064 void BKE_icon_set(int icon_id, struct Icon* icon);
00065

00067 void BKE_icon_delete(struct ID* id);
00068 
00069 /* report changes - icon needs to be recalculated */
00070 void BKE_icon_changed(int icon_id);
00071 
00072 /* free all icons */
00073 void BKE_icons_free(void);
